articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Yu Ki Hang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Yu Ki Hang
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Friday sent a wreath to the bier of KPA General Yu Ki Hang, chief of a department and lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Political Bureau of C.C. WPK Adopts Resolution
articles.content:
Political Bureau of C.C. WPK Adopts Resolution
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- On February 10, Juche 104 (2015), the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea met in Pyongyang, capital of the revolution. 
					Attending the meeting were members of the Presidium of, and members and alternate members of, the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					The meeting adopted a resolution of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, titled, "On Greeting the 70th Anniversaries of the Founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Liberation of the Country as Revolutionary, Auspicious Events of Songun Korea Which Is Prospering under the Leadership of the Great Party."
					
					The resolution stated that our Party, army and people will greet before long the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the glorious Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of the country in a meaningful way. 
					
					A grand celebration of the anniversaries will constitute an important occasion for exalting the brilliance of the immortal exploits performed by the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who achieved the historic cause of national liberation, founded a revolutionary party of the Juche type and led our revolution along the road resplendent with victory, and for demonstrating the high prestige and militant might of our Party, which is adorning the new century of the Juche era with proud victories and prosperity. 
					
					Holding fast to the banner of independence, the great Comrade Kim Il Sung defeated the brigandish Japanese imperialists by fighting a bloody war for 20 years and thus achieved the historic cause of national liberation; and on the basis of the organizational and ideological groundwork of building a party and the glorious revolutionary traditions created in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution, he founded a revolutionary party of the Juche type, the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					By enhancing the leadership role of the Party in the revolution and construction, he led to victory the Fatherland Liberation War, postwar reconstruction and two stages of social revolution, built the people-centred socialist system of our own style, achieved socialist industrialization of our country from scratch, and turned it into a powerful socialist country, which is independent, self-supporting and self-reliant in national defence. 
					
					The great Comrade Kim Jong Il formulated Comrade Kim Il Sung's revolutionary ideology as Kimilsungism and developed our Party into an ideologically pure and organizationally integrated body in which monolithic ideological and leadership systems are firmly established, into a motherly party which has formed a harmonious whole with the masses and serves them, into a seasoned and experienced party which is possessed of a high level of leadership art, and into a promising party which has definitely been assured of the leadership being inherited. 
					
					In the days of the Arduous March and forced march, when our people and revolution faced the worst-ever hardships and trials, he developed our Party into the guiding force of the Songun revolution, firmly safeguarding the sovereignty of our country and nation, developing our motherland into a single-heartedly united politico-ideological power and into an invincible military giant, which no formidable enemy dares to provoke, and kindling the flames of the industrial revolution in the new century to lay a firm foundation on which we can effect a great leap forward, great innovations, in building our country into an economic giant. 
					
					The exploits of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who laid an eternal cornerstone for the victorious advance of our country and revolution by leading the cause of building a party of the Juche type and a prosperous country along the road resplendent with victory, will shine for all ages to come. 
					
					It is the steadfast will of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to further develop our Party and our Republic, which were founded by Comrade Kim Il Sung and led by him and Comrade Kim Jong Il, into the party and state that will shine forever together with the ideas and august names of the great leaders. 
					
					By formulating Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal guiding ideology of our Party and revolution, he has provided a fundamental guarantee for developing ours into the party of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and under the unfurled banner of modelling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he is wisely leading to victory the showdown with the United States and the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					Under his outstanding and seasoned leadership, the prestige and authority of our Party are being raised remarkably, and the history and tradition of victory of heroic Korea are being carried forward to the hilt, and the cause of building a thriving nation is advancing full of vigour despite the incessant moves of the imperialist reactionaries to isolate and suffocate our country. 
					
					The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un said:
					
					"We must hold up the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of our Party and people, as the sun of Juche, and step up modelling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism so as to build on this land a dignified, thriving socialist country, a powerful Paektusan nation, as wished by the great Generalissimos."
					
					All Party members, service personnel and people, rallied behind the Party ring after ring under the slogan "Let us all turn out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!" must make greater efforts to create a new speed of the times, the speed of Korea, in building a thriving socialist country and demonstrate to the whole world the prestige and mettle of the prospering Songun Korea. 
					
					The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea has adopted a resolution on the measures aimed at greeting the 70th anniversaries of Party founding and national liberation as revolutionary, auspicious events of Songun Korea which is prospering under the leadership of the great Party by giving full play to the revolutionary spirit and mettle of Paektu. The resolution reads in the following vein:
					
					First, we will hold the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leaders of our Party and people and add eternal brilliance to their immortal revolutionary exploits. 
					
					We will splendidly lay out the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, where the great Generalissimos are preserved in their lifetime appearances, as the eternal sanctuary of the sun and defend it to the death, and have their bronze and coloured statues set up at such important units as those visited by them. 
					
					We will renovate the Korean Revolution Museum as befits the storehouse of national treasures, where one can learn the revolutionary careers of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and their immortal exploits in a comprehensive way, spruce up other bases for education in revolutionary traditions and intensify educational work through them. 
					
					Second, we will strengthen the Party and consolidate rock-solid the single-hearted unity of our Party and revolutionary ranks. 
					
					This is a decisive guarantee for carrying forward through the generations and accomplishing under the leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun pioneered on Paektu. 
					
					We will establish stringent organizational discipline whereby the whole Party acts as one under the monolithic leadership of the respected Marshal, and consolidate the political and ideological position of our revolution by taking hold of public sentiments and uniting the masses of the people firmly around the Party. 
					
					Third, we will hold fast to the Party's line of the Songun revolution so as to build up our national self-defence capability.
					
					In order to achieve final victory in the showdown with the United States and speed up the building of a thriving socialist country, it is urgent to strengthen the People's Army, the buttress and main force of the Songun revolution, develop defence industry and step up the work of arming all the people and fortifying the whole country on a high level. 
					
					We will establish the monolithic command system of the respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un more firmly across the People's Army and press on with the movement of winning the titles of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and Guards Unit, in order to develop the army into an invincible force of guards who are fully possessed of the spirit of defending their leader and country to the death, the strongest in idea and faith, and capable of winning all battles. 
					
					We will display the same spirit and mettle as we did in conquering outer space to manufacture larger numbers of powerful, cutting-edge military hardware of our own style that are of high precision, light, unmanned and intelligent, so that we can cope with modern warfare, and develop defence industry by relying on latest science and technology.
					
					Fourth, we will raise a fierce wind and achieve a major leap forward on all the fronts where we are building a thriving socialist country, in order to usher in a great golden age of Songun Korea. 
					
					That all sectors and all units of the national economy accelerate the onward march to bring about an upsurge in the building of an economic giant is a sure guarantee for fully demonstrating the country's might as a politico-ideological and military power and achieving a brilliant triumph in the struggle to build a thriving nation and defend socialism. 
					
					We will open up a shortcut to the building of the knowledge-based economy by developing science and technology and going beyond the cutting edge, and bring about a radical turn in improving the people's standard of living by resolving the food problem of the people with crop cultivation, animal husbandry and fishing as the main thrusts and directing great efforts to developing light industry. 
					
					In particular, we will firmly take hold of agriculture as an area of major thrust, enlist and concentrate nationwide efforts for agricultural production, speed up the building of the livestock farming base in the Sepho area, and make a fresh turn in the development of animal husbandry.
					
					We will open up a new era of "gold sea" and make the whole socialist country permeated with the fragrant smell of fish and other kinds of seafood by decisively bolstering up the fishing sector, and direct uninterrupted efforts to developing light industry so as to increase the production of consumer goods for the people.
					
					We will thoroughly translate the Party's Juche-oriented idea on architecture into reality and usher in a new golden age of construction by completing without fail and by the dates set by the Party such major projects as building the Sci-Tech Complex, Mirae Scientists Street, second-stage Wisong Scientists Dwelling District, Terminal 2 of Pyongyang International Airport, Building No 3 of Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Architecture and Secondary School No 1 and renovating the Central Zoo and Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					We will make a leap forward in the vanguard sectors, basic industries, including electric-power generation, coal mining, rail transport and metal, chemical and machine-building industries, and other major sectors of the national economy.
					
					We will direct nationwide efforts especially to expediting the construction of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station, the multi-tier power stations on the Chongchon River and the Wonsan Army-People Power Station, and to stepping up modernization of factories and enterprises.
					
					We will bring about a new turn in the fields of education, public health service, art and literature, mass media and sports and in conserving the cultural heritage of our nation and exalting their brilliance by putting spurs to the building of a civilized socialist nation.
					
					We will enlist the whole Party, the entire army and all the people in restoring the forests of the country and improving the work of land administration so as to transform the appearance of the country's land.
					
					We will arouse the whole society to vigorously conduct mass-based movements like those of winning the titles of Forest of Socialist Patriotism and Model County in Afforestation, and push ahead with the work of covering the whole country with fruit and other trees and flowers on the strength of cooperation between the service personnel and people.
					
					Fifth, we will make a vigorous effort to achieve the historic cause of national reunification and promote international solidarity with our revolution.
					
					Holding aloft the slogan "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!" we will resolutely frustrate the anti-DPRK war moves and nuclear and human rights rackets by the US imperialists and the south Korean puppets and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification by uniting firmly all the fellow countrymen in the north, in the south and abroad under the banner of patriotism, under the ideal of By Our Nation Itself; we will also develop foreign relations in a multilateral and proactive way, and strengthen international solidarity with our revolution.
					
					Sixth, we will organize and hold events in celebration of the 70th anniversaries of Party founding and national liberation as grand political festivals.
					
					We will hold in grand style a parade of the service personnel of the ground, naval, air and anti-aircraft and strategic forces of the Korean People's Army and a procession of Pyongyang citizens in celebration of the Party's 70th anniversary so as to fully demonstrate at home and abroad the might of the service personnel and people united single-heartedly behind the respected Marshal.
					
					We will also hold different political events in a meaningful way to mark these landmark anniversaries.
					
					The resolution, in its last part, stressed the need for Party organizations and other political organs at all levels to thoroughly implement the tasks set forth in the resolution by scrupulously arranging organizational and political work to carry it out and regularly keeping up-to-date with the progress of the work, and for the Cabinet and other relevant organs to take administrative and practical measures to carry out these tasks.
					
					Looking back with deep emotion upon the immortal revolutionary exploits the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu performed for the development of the Party and the building of a prosperous country, our service personnel and people are now filled with a firm determination to work harder to achieve the final victory of the revolution under the leadership of the great Party.
					
					Invincible is the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea, the party of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, which is advancing under the leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un holding aloft the banner of independence and Songun, and certain is the final victory of the building of a thriving socialist nation, a powerful Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Wednesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 On the occasion of the 73rd birth anniversary of leader HE Kim Jong Il, I am pleased to celebrate this significant holiday with Your Excellency.
					
					 I wish Your Excellency good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity. 
					
					 Please accept my highest tribute to Your Excellency.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 A staff member of the Palestinian embassy here conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Service Personnel of KPA Meet to Renew Their Pledge
articles.content:
Service Personnel of KPA Meet to Renew Their Pledge
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force and Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army met at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Friday to pay the highest tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and to vow to bring earlier the final victory of the Songun revolutionary cause under the leadership of respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.  
					 Present there were commanding officers of the KPA, service personnel of the Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force and Strategic Force and cadets of military academies at all levels.
					
					 All the participants paid the highest tribute to the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a speech at the meeting.
					
					  He said that all the service personnel marking the Day of the Shining Star, the greatest national holiday, paid the highest tribute to the Generalissimos and extended best wishes for their immortality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who had an iron will to successfully accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche started and led to victory by Kim Il Sung, performed immortal feats on behalf of the country and the revolution, the era and the history with his brilliant wisdom, outstanding and experienced Songun revolutionary leadership, the speaker said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the KPA into the army strong in idea and faith and  loyal to the party and the leader and a-match-for-a-hundred revolutionary armed forces and achieved one victory after another in the battle for defending socialism unprecedented in history, making difficult long journeys of Songun with his iron will and superhuman efforts. 
					
					 If the gangster-like U.S. imperialists, the chieftain of aggression and provocation, encroach upon the DPRK's sovereignty, dignity and right to existence even in 0.001 mm, the KPA will make the most merciless and deadliest strike at them.
					
					 Army Lieut. General Kim Yong Bok, commander of the 11th Corps of the KPA, Navy Rear Admiral Ho Sang Mun, vice-commander of the Navy, Col. General Choe Yong Ho, commander of the Air and Anti-Air Force, and Col. General Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the Strategic Force, made speeches.
					
					 They reiterated their will to achieve the great cause of Mt. Paektu without fail with the invincible might of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's army and Kim Jong Un's powerful revolutionary army, flying the red flag of the Workers' Party of Korea as the first colors of the revolution.

articles.title: 19th Kimjongilia Festival Opens
articles.content:
19th Kimjongilia Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The 19th Kimjongilia Festival opened with due ceremony here on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Displayed at the venue of the festival were potted immortal flowers cultivated with much care by armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions and many other units, people of different social standings and school youth and children. 
					
					 On display there were potted flowers of the sun presented by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, overseas Koreans, staff members of foreign diplomatic missions and missions of international bodies here, foreign friendship and solidarity organizations and foreigners. 
					
					 The venue of the festival decorated with tens of thousands of potted Kimjongilias in full bloom Koreans and progressives cultivated and rare flowers of other species presented spectacular scenery.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials of the organizing committee of the festival, officials of the army and society which displayed the flowers of the sun, overseas compatriots, members of the societies for disseminating and supporting immortal flowers and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 He said that the festival was a great political festival demonstrating not only the iron faith and will of the servicepersons and people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages and preserve and glorify his revolutionary exploits but boundless reverence of progressive mankind for him. 
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony the participants looked round the venue of the festival.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Staff members of diplomatic missions and those of international organizations here visited the venue of the 19th Kimjongilia Festival on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were admired to look round the venue of the festival decorated with immortal flowers, which presented spectacular scenery.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Cuban Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez said the festival shows well the DPRK where the leader and the people form a harmonious whole and the noble feelings of the Korean people revering the peerlessly great man. The invincible single-minded unity of the leader and the people is the basic factor of all victories.
					
					 Egyptian Ambassador Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed said he could know well how deep the reverence of the Korean people for HE Kim Jong Il who lies in state is. Flowers on display reflect the will of the Korean people to translate into reality everything desired by Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 Lao Ambassador Kiettisak Keobanhdith wrote in the visitor's book he sincerely wished the Korean people would certainly build a thriving nation and reunify the country independently and peacefully under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, they visited the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage on the same day.

articles.title: Art Performances Given by Art Groups of Ministries, National Institutions
articles.content:
Art Performances Given by Art Groups of Ministries, National Institutions
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given by art groups of ministries and national institutions at the People's Palace of Culture and the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Performances were given by employees of at least 30 units including the State Academy of Sciences, the Ministry of Electric Power Industry and the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection. 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Put on the stages were choruses "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" and "Attraction and Reverence", oungum ensemble of immortal masterpiece "The Embrace of My Motherland", male chorus "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by demonstrating the dignity and might of Juche Korea and ushering in a new era for building a thriving nation despite stern tempest of revolution, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 Also staged were numbers instilling into the audience the conviction that the future of Kim Il Sung's nation is bright as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, a great man of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea held a meeting at the Mangyongdae Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District here on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il's birth on Mt. Paektu was the great fortune of the nation that promised the bright future of Kim Il Sung's Korea and an event of worldwide significance that opened a bright prospect of the human cause of independence. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the peerless politician and Songun brilliant commander who brought about a revolutionary turn for the first time in the 5 000-year-old national history in all fields of politics, military affairs, economy and culture with his outstanding idea and energetic leadership, they said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to his endless devotion and efforts, the flame of the agricultural revolution raged and hundreds of thousands of hectares were rezoned as befitting the land of socialist Korea, creating the sea of fruit trees.
					
					 His revolutionary career and feats are being further glorified under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called for getting united close around the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un and devoting sweats of patriotism to the struggle for translating into reality Kim Jong Il's desire for building the prosperous country.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the union and those concerned and agricultural workers.

articles.title: Women's Performance Given on Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Women's Union
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea staged an art performance "February Is Everlasting Spring of Kim Jong Il's Korea" at the Hall of Women on Friday on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Put on the stage were trio and chorus "February Is Spring" and "Our General Is the Great Songun Brilliant Commander" and duet and chorus "Song of Love for People" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by making journeys of devotion for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people and opening up the avenue to everlasting happiness and prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation. 
					
					 Folk song in unison "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" and kayagum and janggu ensemble "Song of Big Fish Haul" stroke the chord with the audience as they reflected the stirring reality of the country in which the seeds sown by Kim Jong Il with great devotion for building a thriving nation bear a bumper harvest under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The numbers reflected the resolution of the women to make society a large harmonious family and make patriotic devotion to keeping their households, worksites, streets and villages neat and tidy.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean President Hopes for Reunification of Korea
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean President Hopes for Reunification of Korea
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, received Kwak Ji Hwan, DPRK ambassador to the country, on Feb. 4.
					 He highly appreciated the great achievements made by the Korean people in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and build a thriving nation under the wise guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Equatorial Guinea is always attaching importance to the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK and maintaining the fixed stand to continue expanding them, he noted.
					
					 He said Equatorial Guinea hoped that the relations of the north and the south of Korea would be mended and it be reunified at an early date.

articles.title: Exemplary Youth Union Bodies, Their Officials and Members and Members of Children Union Commended
articles.content:
Exemplary Youth Union Bodies, Their Officials and Members and Members of Children Union Commended
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize and Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize were awarded to exemplary primary committees of the youth league and its officials and members, and members of the Korean Children's Union on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize was awarded to eight primary committees of the youth league and its 20 officials and members who devotedly worked to build the youth league organizations into the ranks of the Songun young vanguard, performed exploits in defending the motherland and building a thriving nation and distinguished themselves in study and organizational life. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize was conferred upon 103 members of the children's union who set examples in study, organizational life, social and political activities and do-good-thing movement to become genuine juvenile revolutionaries and children's guards in the Songun era. 
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the hall of the youth league on Friday.

articles.title: Our Classroom Literary Prize Awarded to Schoolchildren
articles.content:
Our Classroom Literary Prize Awarded to Schoolchildren 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Our Classroom Literary Prize went to schoolchildren with due ceremony at the hall of the youth league on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Over 410 students received the prize. Among them are Mun Wi Song at Kang Pan Sok Senior Secondary School, Jong Won Mi at Inhung Junior Secondary School in Moranbong District and Kim Pok at Toksong Junior Secondary School in Tokchon City. 
					
					 Child-poems "Twin Rainbow on Mt. Paektu" and "Birthplace in Spring" and occasional notes and other pieces reflect boundless reverence of schoolchildren of the DPRK for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who devoted their all to prosperity of the country and happiness of the people. 
					
					 They truthfully reflect the pictures of schoolchildren preparing themselves to be pillars of powerful Korea. 
					
					 Among them were child-poem "Certificate of Representatives of Children's Union," draft of child-poems "Wing of Yearning" and diary "Wakeful Night" show the schoolchildren's will to convey down through generations the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un who provided the events for celebrating the 66th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union and was also present in the 7th Congress of KCU.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su,  sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral basket was laid before their statues on Feb. 13.

articles.title: Int'l Organizations Lay Floral Baskets before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Int'l Organizations Lay Floral Baskets before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the WFP and FAO Friday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: International Friendship Botanical House
articles.content:
International Friendship Botanical House
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The International Friendship Botanical House in the Central Botanical Garden of the DPRK is bustling with visitors on the threshold of the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 At the house there are many species of plants foreigners and overseas compatriots presented to the great person of Mt. Paektu as gifts. They include Kimjongilia, Camellia japonica, Rhododendron obtusum, Pelargonium peltatum and other species of rare flowering trees from Asia, North America and other parts of the world. 
					
					 Seeing those flowers in full bloom, the visitors have expressed their deep yearning and reverence for the leader.
					
					 About 400 species of flowering plants and shrubs and fruit trees grow at the house, said Kim Jong Ok, section chief of the Central Botanical Garden, adding:
					
					 The house has paid much effort to the cultivation and propagation of those rare-to-be-seen plants. In recent 10 years it cultivated more than 200 species of greenhouse plants and 500 species of field plants to supply them to more than one thousand units in the country.

articles.title: Ri In Mo, Incarnation of Faith and Will
articles.content:
Ri In Mo, Incarnation of Faith and Will
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Ri In Mo is well-known among the DPRK people as an incarnation of faith and will.
					 Born into a fire-field farmer's family in Kim Hyong Gwon County, Ryanggang Province on August 24, Juche 6 (1917), Ri embarked on the road of anti-Japanese struggle when Korea was under Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 After the country's liberation, he worked as a local party official.
					
					 During the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War, he was active as a war correspondent.
					
					 He was arrested by the enemy while fighting as a guerilla in the area of Mt. Jiri, before serving 34-year-long prison term.
					
					 Though he was put behind the bars for a long time, he did not abandon his faith and will, in order to honor the dignity as a member of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 In 1993, he was repatriated to the DPRK. At that time, he suffered from heavy illness, including heart disease, lung abscess, dyspnoea and verbal disorder, due to long-term prison life.
					
					 Thanks to the loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he recovered his health and engaged himself in literary work to praise the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 All of his works are enjoying a wide appeal to the people in the DPRK as masterpieces.
					
					 He was awarded the title of DPRK Hero twice, the Order of Kim Il Sung and the National Reunification Prize for the feats he performed for the Party and the leader, the country and the people till the last moment of his life.
					
					 The government erected Ri's bust in Thongil Street, Pyongyang and a documentary "Incarnation of Faith and Will" was produced.

articles.title: Simwon Temple, Korean Nation's Cultural Heritage
articles.content:
Simwon Temple, Korean Nation's Cultural Heritage
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Simwon Temple is one of the ancient relics of the Korean nation with long history and brilliant culture.
					 The temple, located in Sangyang-ri, Pakchon County, North Phyongan Province of the DPRK, was built in the 9th century and rebuilt in 1368.
					
					 Preserved there are valuable historical relics showing the nation's art of painting and wood processing technique.
					
					 When visiting the temple in February Juche 92 (2003), leader Kim Jong Il said that it is a pride of the nation to have many historical cultural relics everywhere in the country. Those relics, associated with Koreans' wisdom and talents, are the nation's precious cultural wealth, he said, advancing the detailed tasks for their preservation.
					
					 Very busy as he was with Songun (military-first) guidance, he toured Anbul and Ryangchon temples and other historical sites to keep alive the fine national tradition.

articles.title: U.S. Use of Biological Weapons in S. Korea Condemned
articles.content:
U.S. Use of Biological Weapons in S. Korea Condemned
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- In the 1950-1953 Korean War the U.S. forces used biological weapons in the southern half of Korea, too.
					 In this regard, Dr. Kang Chol of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 Lots of evidences showing the U.S. use of biological weapons have been disclosed in the United States and south Korea in recent years alone.
					
					 Selig Harrison, an American expert on Korean affairs, referring to the massacre in Rogun-ri of south Korea, stressed that the U.S. forces had used biological weapons in Korea.
					
					 During the war the U.S. spread germs in the areas of Mt. Mudung in Kwangju and Hwasun County, South Jolla Province, on the plea of "punitive operation against guerrillas", killing hundreds of innocent people.
					
					 According to a south Korean who served a U.S. army unit in the wartime, the U.S. 7th Armored Division waged a germ warfare in the area of Phyongchang County, Kangwon Province of south Korea, in March 1951.
					
					 It was also brought to light in 2011 that the U.S. forces stationed in Waegwan, Chilgok County of North Kyongsang Province, buried defoliant in their base in 1978.
					
					 Meanwhile, foreign media made public a secret document of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff on launching a germ warfare in the Korean War, as well as documents on proposing and ordering the germ warfare, which were made by the then U.S. secretary of Defense and chief of staff of the Air Forces.
					
					 Witnesses said the U.S. forces used POWs as guinea-pigs in experiments on germ and chemical weapons in Koje Island.
					
					 A professor at Japan's Shizuoka University published "We show up the U.S. blood-stained 'Justice'", a report on field survey of the germ warfare waged by the U.S. forces during the Korean War. The report said that the U.S. mobilized former members of the imperial Japanese army's "Unit 731" in the warfare.
					
					 Such being a hard fact, the puppet group of south Korea are desperately keen on covering up and patronizing the heinous inhuman crimes committed by the U.S. against the Korean nation during the war.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. National Security Strategy Report
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. National Security Strategy Report
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A recent national security strategy report published by the U.S. administration has become the focus of the attention of the international community.
					 It is because it not only indicates the orientation of the national security strategy of the present administration but serves as a criterion for working out the quadrennial report on the reexamination of defense policy, report on nuclear posture and report of the State Department on the reexamination of diplomatic development.
					
					 In the report the U.S. mentioned "Obama doctrine" that calls for "restraining" U.S. unilateral interference in international issues and "prioritizing" multi-lateral interference.
					
					 While asserting that "collective action will prove stronger" even though it is important for the U.S. to act unilaterally to cope with threats to its national interests, the report said that the U.S. would "restrain" itself from intervening too much in international crises as its resources and influence are by no means inexhaustible.
					
					 Terming the present international security order a "structure in which the U.S. special ability is displayed with the aid from various international alliances and friendly nations in the region", the report called for decreasing the U.S. direct military intervention and increasing the role of allies and friendly countries.
					
					 This is little short of self-admittance that its unilateralism has failed.
					
					 In the past the U.S. regarded self-complacence and high-handed and arbitrary practices as a powerful means for making the world American style and has resorted to undisguised moves to force sovereign countries to lay down arms and to cause the collapse of social systems in those countries.
					
					 It has toppled the governments of those countries which it considered to be an obstacle in realizing its ambition for building a uni-polar world and in establishing its order of domination, assassinated progressive politicians and unhesitatingly committed aggression.
					
					 Due to the U.S. unilateralism that "everything has to move in the U.S. interests and at its will", the world peace and stability have been seriously disturbed and social chaos and uneasiness have been created in different parts of the world. 
					
					 Now Washington trumpets about the "priority of collective actions" and multilateral "cooperation". This means its admission of the reality in which the U.S. military muscle has become weak and financial resources have gone down the drain, first of all. In other words, it is nothing but a stop-gap measure to calm down the international criticism of its unilateral policy.
					
					 This is also a vivid manifestation of the U.S. wild ambition for world domination aimed to rally its allies and contain rivals now that its unilateralism no longer works in the international arena today.
					
					 A typical example is the emphasis put on the rebalancing strategy in Asia-Pacific and the revelation of its attempt to stop Russia and China from expanding their influences. 
					
					 The report also mentioned the shift of diplomatic, economic and military influences to the Asia-Pacific region, strengthened security cooperation and bilateral relations with its allies, aid to Southeast Asian nations now locked in territorial disputes with China, escalated intervention in the regional organizations such as the Association of Southeast Asian Nations and the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation.
					
					 It also revealed an attempt to intensify the monitoring and control over China's modernization of its army and expansion of its clout and to conclude an agreement on the trans-pacific partnership, a link in the whole chain of its rebalancing strategy in Asia-Pacific and thus establish a new economic order led by the U.S. and counter China's economy.
					
					 Pointing to Russia, the report branded Ukrainian crisis as "a serious challenge to the national security" of the U.S. and vowed to "make the Putin government pay a due price and to strongly deter it from opting for expanding its hegemony".
					
					 While renewing its security commitments with EU countries, the U.S. in the report mentioned intensified military activities in the middle and eastern regions of Europe to prevent Russia's invasion and vowed to pursue long-term and short-term plans for curtailing Europe's dependence on Russia's natural resources. 
					
					 Referring to the "nuclear issue" in the DPRK in the report as usual, the U.S.  asserted that north Korea's provocation is likely to lead to tension. Facts, however, more clearly prove that "nuclear issue of north Korea" touted by the Obama administration is nothing but a subterfuge for carrying out its strategy for world domination and the recently published report is a conspiratorial document admitting this.   It is by no means fortuitous that the international community interprets the recent report as one aimed to "contain and tame China" and justifies its strategy to "contain Russia from expanding its influence".
					
					 The U.S. aggressive aim to contain major big powers and dominate the world will never change just as leopards never change their spots.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. cover up its self-complacence and arrogance.
					
					 The U.S. scenario for world domination is bound to fail just as the Roman Empire's wild ambition went bust.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon All Service Personnel, People to Implement Joint Slogans
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon All Service Personnel, People to Implement Joint Slogans
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The joint slogans of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea were published on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the WPK.
					 The joint slogans are the programmes for implementing to the letter the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an editorial, and goes on:

					 The historic significance of the publication of the joint slogans lies in instilling conviction of certain victory and optimism into all service personnel and people and making the whole country seethe with a drive to implement the party's idea and defend the party's policies. 
					
					 The basic spirit of the joint slogans is to encourage all party members, service personnel and people to make persevering efforts in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu as befitting the descendants of President Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il and thus glorify this significant year as a year of the great victory and revolutionary, auspicious year to be specially recorded in the history of the country.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and people should wage a powerful struggle to implement the joint slogans and dynamically advance toward the square for celebrating the victory.

articles.title: SI's Interference in Election Exposed by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
SI's Interference in Election Exposed by S. Korean Paper

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Suppression of Progressive Media under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Suppression of Progressive Media under Fire

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Mobile Drill of Motorized Forces Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Mobile Drill of Motorized Forces Slammed
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The 20th Division of the south Korean puppet Army was busy with the large-scale mobile drill of motorized forces in Yangphyong, Kyonggi Province on Feb. 11, according to a south Korean Internet paper.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Blocking North-South Dialogue
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Blocking North-South Dialogue
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet Foreign Ministry in Seoul on Feb. 9 to denounce the U.S. for blocking the north-south dialogue.
					 In a press release the organization said the U.S. is becoming all the more undisguised in its moves to block the south-north dialogue.

articles.title: Concert Given in U.S.
articles.content:
Concert Given in U.S.
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- "Concert in Spring of February" was given in New York on Feb. 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in China
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in China
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held events in Yanji City, Jilin Province of China on February 9 with the approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).

					 The revolutionary cause of Juche is sure to emerge victorious thanks to the Marshal, the invincible revolutionary army and single-minded unity of all the people.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Il performed undying feats for the history and the people till the last moments of his great life.

					 The good health of Kim Jong Un is the ardent desire and hope of all Koreans and world progressives, it said, wholeheartedly wishing him good health for the prosperity of the country and its independent reunification, the growth of the patriotic movement of Koreans in China and the victory of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Peruvian Political Party
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Peruvian Political Party
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union issued a statement on Feb. 6 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: KPA Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
KPA Lauded by British Organizations

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Cuba
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Cuba
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at an agriculture and stock-farming enterprise in Cuba on February 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 					 On display at the venue of the meeting were photos dealing with the immortal revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

					 Kim Jong Il was representative of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and he always found himself among soldiers of the heroic Korean People's Army and people, glorified the idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and devoted his life to socialist construction and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

He got the knack of the military war method by the table for operational plans at the supreme command during the Korean War.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Denmark, Romania and Switzerland from Feb. 2 to 7 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venues of the meetings were photos documenting the noble revolutionary careers and undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

					 A letter and a congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Denmark and Switzerland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Figure
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, issued a statement on Feb. 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the revolution and construction to victory with his gifted ideological and theoretical wisdom and rare leadership ability for a long period and thus achieved the immortal exploits on behalf of the era and history.
					
					 He comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and firmly defended socialism from the imperialists' moves to invade and stifle it with his original Songun politics.

articles.title: UK Organizations Slam U.S.-S. Korea "Agreements"
articles.content:
UK Organizations Slam U.S.-S. Korea "Agreements"
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Jan. 29 on the lapse of 65 years since the U.S and south Korea fabricated the "Mutual Defense Assistance Agreement".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Angola, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Angola, Nigeria

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda foral ante feretro de difunto Yu Ki Hang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda foral ante feretro de difunto Yu Ki Hang
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el dia 13 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Yu Ki Hang, general del EPC, jefe de departamento y conferenciante del Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, para expresar profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.content:

Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Una reunion del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea se efectuo el 10 de febrero del 104 de la Era Juche (2015) en Pyongyang, capital de la revolucion.

					El documento precisa que dentro de poco nuestro Partido, ejercito y pueblo celebraran solemnemente el aniversario 70 de la fundacion del glorioso PTC y la liberacion del pais.
					
					Esta sera una oportunidad importante para ensalzar las imperecederas proezas de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. Kim Il Sung realizo la historica obra de la liberacion del pais y fundo un partido revolucionario del Juche. Nuestra revolucion, guiada por los dos lideres, ha podido continuar por el unico camino colmado de victorias. En esa ocasion tambien se pondran de pleno manifiesto el alto prestigio y la combatividad de nuestro Partido que en la nueva centuria logra resonantes triunfos y logra el mayor fortalecimiento y prosperidad del pais.
					
					Al librar durante 20 anos una sangrienta guerra contra el imperialismo japones enarbolando la bandera de la independencia, el gran Lider Kim Il Sung lo derroto, cumplio la historica tarea de liberar al pais y, a partir del cimiento ideologico-organizativo para la fundacion de un partido y las brillantes tradiciones revolucionarias preparadas durante la revolucion antijaponesa, fundo el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, una organizacion revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Al multiplicar su papel rector en la revolucion y la construccion, condujo a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, la rehabilitacion y construccion de postguerra y la revolucion social en dos etapas, establecio nuestro regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares, concluyo la industrializacion socialista y convirtio al pais en un poderoso Estado socialista independiente politica, economica y militarmente, venciendo multiples dificultades.
					
					Luego de formular la idea revolucionaria de Kim Il Sung como kimilsungismo, el gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il convirtio a nuestro Partido en una agrupacion ideologicamente pura y organicamente integra que tiene bien establecidos los sistemas de ideologia y direccion unica, en una madre que logra total armonia con el pueblo y le ofrece mejores servicios, en una organizacion probada y experimentada con un gran arte de mando y en una gran promesa que garantiza la continuidad de la direccion.
					
					Al consolidar a nuestro Partido como fuerza orientadora de la revolucion del Songun durante la Marcha Penosa, la Forzada, cuando nuestro pueblo y revolucion enfrentaban pesimos y multiples contratiempos y dificultades, el gran Dirigente  Kim Jong Il salvaguardo firmemente la soberania nacional e hizo del pais una potencia ideo-politica sustentada en la unidad monolitica y una invencible potencia militar a la que ninguno, por muy fuerte que sea, se atreve a agredir. Tambien dio inicio de la revolucion industrial de la nueva centuria y asento una solida base para producir grandes saltos e innovaciones en la construccion de la potencia economica.
					
					Se transmitiran a toda la posteridad los meritos de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes al conducir hacia la victoria la causa de la construccion de un partido autoctono y la edificacion de un pais poderoso y prospero prepararon una base de eterna duracion para el victorioso avance de nuestra patria y revolucion.
					
					Asociar eternamente con la ideologia y los respetables nombres de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il a nuestro Partido y Republica, fundados por el primero y orientados por los dos, es la invariable voluntad del estimado companero Kim Jong Un.
					
					Al formular el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como eterna ideologia rectora de nuestro Partido y revolucion, Kim Jong Un preparo la garantia fundamental para desarrollar nuestro Partido como el de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y, mediante la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo, conduce acertadamente hacia la victoria el enfrentamiento con Estados Unidos y la construccion de un Estado poderoso y prospero.
					
					En virtud de su destacada y probada direccion, hoy la dignidad y el prestigio de nuestro Partido se elevan notablemente. Pese a las interminables maquinaciones de aislamiento y estrangulamiento de los reaccionarios imperialistas, la historia y la tradicion de victorias sucesivas de la Corea heroica continuan de generacion en generacion y la causa de la construccion de un Estado poderoso y prospero cobra mayor fuerza y vigor.
					
					El estimado companero Kim Jong Un dijo:
					
					"Al enaltecer a los grandes Generalisimos como eternos Lideres de nuestro Partido y pueblo y Sol del Juche e impulsar energicamente la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo, debemos levantar en este territorio un digno Estado socialista poderoso y prospero, la potencia Paektusan, tal como deseaban el gran Lider y el gran Dirigente."
					
					En fiel acato a la consigna "!Alcemonos todos en la ofensiva general para anticipar la victoria final con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu!", todos los miembros del Partido, militares y civiles deben formar multiples cercos en torno al Partido y empenarse con denuedo para crear la velocidad de Corea, la de la nueva epoca, en la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero, para asi manifestar ante el mundo la dignidad y el espiritu de la poderosa y prospera Corea del Songun.
					
					El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido decide que todos, con el espiritu e impetu revolucionarios del Paektu, celebren el 70 aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y de la liberacion de la patria como acontecimientos revolucionarios de la Corea del Songun que se hace poderosa y prospera bajo la direccion del gran Partido.
					
					Primero, la resolucion acentua la necesidad de enaltecer a los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il como eternos Lideres de nuestro Partido y pueblo y hacer valer generacion tras generacion las proezas de los Generalisimos.
					
					Se refiere a la tarea de acondicionar mejor y defender a ultranza el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, donde se conservan los restos de los grandes Generalisimos, como eterno lugar sagrado del Sol y erigir con sumo respeto las estatuas y las esculturas de colores de los Generalisimos en las unidades importantes como las visitadas por ellos.
					
					Ademas, senala la importancia de acondicionar las bases de la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias, por ejemplo, reconstruir el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana en un acervo nacional, sintesis de la gran historia y los inmortales meritos revolucionarios de las eminentes figuras del monte Paektu, e intensificar la educacion mediante estos lugares.
					
					Como segundo punto, la resolucion enfatiza el fortalecimiento del Partido y la consolidacion de la unidad de este y de las filas revolucionarias, lo cual constituye una garantia decisiva para llevar a cabo generacion tras generacion bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, que tiene su origen en el monte Paektu.
					
					Sugiere establecer una ferrea disciplina organizativa segun la cual todo el Partido actua como un solo hombre bajo la unica direccion del Mariscal, conocer bien la opinion publica y aglutinar a las masas alrededor del Partido, con vistas a consolidar mas la base politico-ideologica de nuestra revolucion.
					
					Como tercer punto subraya el fortalecimiento del poderio autodefensivo del pais en acato al lineamiento revolucionario del Partido que prioriza los asuntos militares.
					
					Para lograr la victoria final en el enfrentamiento con Estados Unidos y acelerar con pujanza la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero es necesario fortalecer mas el Ejercito Popular, pilar y fuerza principal de la revolucion del Songun, desarrollar la industria de defensa nacional y lograr el alto nivel del armamento de todo el pueblo y de la fortificacion de todo el pais.
					
					Deben establecer firmemente el sistema de direccion unica del Comandante Supremo sobre el ejercito y desarrollar activamente el Movimiento por el Titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup y el de la Unidad Guardia, de modo que el Ejercito Popular se prepare como guardia invencible y tropas de firme ideologia y fe, imbuidas del espiritu de defender a riesgo de la vida a su lider y la patria.
					
					La resolucion recalca que, con el espiritu y temple con que exploraron el cosmos, deben desarrollar mas armamentos autoctonos dotados de la tecnologia de punta, de gran precision, ligeros, no tripulados e inteligentes, conforme a la guerra contemporanea, y aplicar en nuestra industria de defensa los ultimos logros cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					En su cuarto punto la resolucion subraya la necesidad de dar nuevos saltos en todos los dominios de la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero para asi abrir una era de gran prosperidad de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Acelerar la marcha por el gran auge en la construccion de una potencia economica en todas las ramas y unidades de la economia nacional es una firme garantia para poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la potencia politico-ideologica y militar y lograr una brillante victoria en la edificacion de un Estado poderoso y prospero y la defensa del socialismo.
					
					Es preciso desarrollar las ciencias y la tecnologia y superar a los demas en la tecnologia de punta para abrir un atajo en la construccion de la economia del conocimiento,  resolver el problema de alimentacion de la poblacion tomando como tres pilares la agricultura, la ganaderia y la pesqueria, y producir un cambio decisivo en la mejora de la vida de la poblacion al priorizar el desarrollo de la industria ligera.
					
					Es de particular importancia movilizar y concentrar todas las fuerzas en la produccion agricola considerandola como la mayor prioridad, acelerar la construccion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho y lograr un nuevo cambio en el desarrollo de la ganaderia.
					
					El documento hace hincapie en desarrollar decisivamente el sector pesquero para escribir la nueva historia del mar de oro y respirar el intenso olor del mar socialista en todo el pais, asi como seguir poniendo gran empeno en el desarrollo de la industria ligera y lograr un gran cambio en la produccion de articulos de consumo masivo.
					
					Urge terminar incondicionalmente hasta la fecha indicada por el Partido la construccion o la remodelacion de las obras importantes como el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnologia, el Reparto de Cientificos Mirae, la segunda fase de la zona residencial de cientificos Wisong, la terminal 2 del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang, el edificio docente 3 de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Instituto Universitario de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, la Escuela Secundaria No. 1, el Jardin Zoologico Central y el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae, y de esta manera materializar cabalmente la original idea del Partido sobre la arquitectura y abrir una era de gran prosperidad para el sector de la construccion.
					
					La resolucion se refiere a la tarea de dar grandes pasos de avance en los reglones principales de la economia como los sectores priorizados, los de las industrias basicas, entre ellas la electricidad, el carbon, el ferrocarril, la metalurgia, la quimica y la maquinaria.
					
					Mencion aparte merece la movilizacion de todo el Estado para impulsar la construccion de la Centrales Hidroelectrica Juventud del Songun en el monte Paektu, las escalonadas Chongchongang y la Militar-Civil de Wonsan y la modernizacion de fabricas y empresas.
					
					El documento presenta la tarea de acelerar la construccion de un Estado socialista civilizado, registrar nuevos cambios en los sectores de la educacion, la salud publica, el arte y la literatura, la prensa y el deporte, asi como preservar y enriquecer el patrimonio cultural de la nacion.
					
					Exhorta a todo el Partido, ejercito y pueblo a movilizarse a la recuperacion de bosques, mejorar el mantenimiento del territorio nacional y renovar su fisonomia.
					
					Sugiere desarrollar en toda la sociedad los movimientos masivos como el por el Titulo del Bosque Patriotico Socialista y el del Distrito Ejemplar en la Reforestacion y convertir todo el pais en bosques, jardines y huertos mediante la cooperacion militar-civil.
					
					En su quinto punto la resolucion subraya la necesidad de librar energicamente la lucha encaminada a lograr la historica causa de la reunificacion nacional y fortalecer la solidaridad internacional de nuestra revolucion. 
					
					Es necesario, apunta, frustrar resueltamente las maniobras de guerra del imperialismo norteamericano y sus lacayos surcoreanos contra nuestra Republica y sus confabulaciones en torno a nuestros "problemas nucleares y de derechos humanos" y que todos los coreanos del Norte, Sur y en el extranjero se unan bajo la bandera del patriotismo y el ideal Entre nosotros, los connacionales, con el fin de hacer realidad la consigna "!En este ano del 70 aniversario de la liberacion de la patria abramos un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente del pais con la fuerza unida de toda la nacion!". Urge ampliar multilateralmente y con iniciativa las relaciones exteriores y reforzar mas la solidaridad internacional de nuestra revolucion, agrega.
					
					En su sexto punto la resolucion se refiere a la tarea de organizar y llevar a cabo por todo lo alto las actividades para celebrar como grandes festivales politicos el 70 aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la liberacion de la patria.
					
					En conmemoracion de la fundacion del Partido se llevaran a cabo una parada militar con la participacion de las fuerzas terrestre, naval, aerea-antiaerea y estrategica del Ejercito Popular de Corea y un desfile multitudinario de los capitalinos, con miras a demostrar ante el mundo el poderio de la unidad monolitica de militares y civiles coreanos aglomerados en torno al estimado Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Con motivo de las efemerides tambien se efectuaran significativamente varios actos politicos.
					
					Finalmente, con el objetivo de cumplir cabalmente las tareas presentadas, la resolucion exige a las organizaciones partidistas a todos los niveles y los organos politicos realizar una esmerada labor organizativa y politica y controlar y dirigirla con regularidad y al Consejo de Ministros y otras instituciones correspondientes tomar medidas de caracter administrativo y practico.
					
					En estos momentos nuestro ejercito y pueblo evocan profundamente las sempiternas hazanas revolucionarias realizadas por las eminentes figuras del monte Paektu para el fortalecimiento del Partido y la construccion de una patria poderosa y prospera y estan firmemente decididos a esforzarse mas para la victoria final de la revolucion siguiendo la orientacion del gran Partido.
					
					Invencible es la causa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, organizacion de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il que avanza con la bandera de la independencia y del Songun en alto siguiendo la direccion del estimado companero Kim Jong Un, y definitivo es el triunfo final de la construccion de la potencia Paektusan, Estado socialista poderoso y prospero.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente sirio 
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 11 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					El texto senala:
					
					Su Excelencia Mariscal
					
					Con motivo del 73o aniversario de natalicio de Su Excelencia Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tengo el placer de celebrar junto con Su Excelencia esta fiesta significativa. 
					
					Deseo a Su Excelencia buena salud y felicidad, y al amistoso pueblo coreano, mayor progreso y prosperidad.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan el acto de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas y estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea para rendir tributo a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y jurar adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Songun bajo la orientacion del Comandante Supremo del EPC, Kim Jong Un. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion los comandantes del EPC, los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas y estrategicas del EPC y los cadetes de las academias militares a todos los niveles. 
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron el homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa. 
					
					Hizo uso de la palabra el vicemariscal del EPC, Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El orador dijo que con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, maxima fiesta nacional, todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC rinden el mas sublime homenaje y desean la eternidad a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Con la ferrea voluntad de llevar a feliz termino con armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche, iniciada y conducida victoriosamente por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizo indelebles proezas por la patria, la revolucion, la epoca y la historia practicando la destacada y probada direccion revolucionaria del Songun, recordo.
					
					Continuo que emprendiendo con la voluntad de acero y esfuerzos sobrehumanos el arduo camino del Songun, el Dirigente fortalecio el EPC como ejercito de flor y nata infinitamente fiel al partido y al lider y logro victoria tras victoria en la defensa del socialismo. 
					
					Si el imperialismo norteamericano, banda de agresores y provocadores, atenta, aunque en lo minimo, contra la soberania, la dignidad y el derecho a la vida de la RPDC, el EPC asestara sin advertencia o aviso previo el golpe mas implacable, advirtio.
					
					Luego, pronunciaron discursos de juramento el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Kim Yong Bok, jefe del cuerpo de ejercito 11 del EPC, el contralmirante Ho Sang Mun,  subcomandante de las fuerzas navales del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas aereas, Choe Yong Ho, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y el coronel general del EPC Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.
					
					Ellos expresaron la voluntad de cumplir sin falta la gran causa del Paektu con el poderio invencible del Ejercito de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Kim Jong Un levantando en alto la bandera roja del PTC como primer estandarte de la revolucion.

articles.title: Inaugurado XIX Festival de Kimjongilias por Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Inaugurado XIX Festival de Kimjongilias por Dia de Estrella Luz 
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado el viernes en esta capital el XIX Festival de Kimjongilias dedicado al dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il instituido como Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					Estan exhibidas ahi las kimjongilias cultivadas con sinceridad por las instituciones de fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales y otras unidades, trabajadores de diversos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Tambien expusieron las mismas flores el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon, los compatriotas en ultramar, las representaciones diplomaticas de varios paises y de organizaciones internacionales acreditadas en Corea, las entidades de amistad y solidaridad y las personalidades de varios paises.
					
					La sede del festival formaba un mundo maravilloso con decenas de miles de kimjongilias y otras flores raras, cultivadas con esmero por el pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios del comite organizador del festival y del ejercito y la sociedad exponentes, los compatriotas en ultramar, los miembros de la asociacion de apoyo a la divulgacion de flores y el  representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					El presidente del Comite de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia de Corea, Kim Chang Do, pronuncio la palabra de apertura.
					
					El presente festival es la gran cita politica que demostrara al interior y exterior del pais la decision de todos los militares y habitantes coreanos de enaltecer siempre como sol del Juche al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y defender sus hazanas revolucionarias y la gran veneracion de la humanidad progresista del mundo hacia ese gran hombre sin par. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia inaugural, los participantes realizaron un recorrido por la sede del festival.

articles.title: Entidad de DDHH de Corea insiste en abolicion de "ley de seguridad" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Entidad de DDHH de Corea insiste en abolicion de "ley de seguridad" en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, la banda titere del Sur de Corea, en la extrema crisis de gobernacion, recurre mas freneticamente a la enmienda de la "ley de seguridad" y a la represion fascista a las fuerzas progresistas democraticas para mantener su poder, el portavoz de la Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea hizo publica el dia 12 una declaracion.
					La "ley de seguridad" inventada por el traidor Syngman Rhee sirvio para los antecedentes mandatarios titeres como medio mortifero de represion a fin de liquidar la banda politica de opositores y mantener el regimen de gobernacion.
					
					Asi subraya el documento y continua:
					
					Hoy, la "ley de seguridad" ha sido un pronombre de pavor.
					
					En una palabra, es la ley fascista nunca vista en la historia y la maligna de exterminacion de DDHH.
					
					La represion fascista de la banda titere convierte toda la extension surcoreana en un horrible lugar de ahorcamiento de DDHH.
					
					Pero, en vez de abolir la "ley de seguridad", la actual banda surcoreana trata de enmendarla. Asi, la actual banda es el cabecillo de violacion de DDHH y dictador fascista que supera la banda fascista "Yusin".
					
					Sin embargo, habla descaradamente de "DDHH" de alguien.
					
					La "ley de seguridad" que convirtio el Sur de Corea en el desierto y el infierno de DDHH, no debe ser enmendada sino abolida inmediatamente.
					
					Por ultimo, la declaracion exige a la conciencia de la humanidad y la imparcial opinion de la sociedad internacional alzar las voces en demanda de cancelacion de la "ley de seguridad".
